4835:
No survivors in this game of hate
We all get changed in a certain way
Our ideals changed by mortar
There isn't a person who doesn't pay

No survivors, burst the bubble

No survivors, don't conform

Boys mature to men in weeks
While rivals stay on the boil
The time is right, the 'real' cowards
We all suffer at this toil
